languages.text: "Эмелина Иона Лихтенхарт. Именем Инквизиции я приговариваю вас к низложению с занимаемого поста и отлучению от Святого Ордоса". {n}Хейнрикс взирает на Эмелину, однако та не смотрит на него. Затем дознаватель переводит взгляд на вас.{/n}

"Emelina Iona Lichtenhart. In the name of the Inquisition, you are hereby removed from your post and expelled from the Holy Ordo." {n}Heinrix's eyes are fixed on Emelina, but she does not look at him. Then the Interrogator turns his gaze on you.{/n}
languages.original_text: "Эмелина Иона Лихтенхарт. Именем Инквизиции я приговариваю вас к низложению с занимаемого поста и отлучению от Святого Ордоса". {n}Хейнрикс взирает на Эмелину, однако та не смотрит на него. Затем дознаватель переводит взгляд на вас.{/n}

traits.locale_text: "Emelina Iona Lichtenhart. In the name of the Inquisition, you are hereby removed from your post and expelled from Holy Ordos." {n}Heinrix's eyes are fixed on Emelina, but she does not look at him. Then the Interrogator turns his gaze on you.{/n}
traits.speaker: HeinrixCompanion

traits.locale_text: "Emelina Iona Lichtenhart. In the name of the Inquisition, you are hereby removed from your post and expelled from Holy Ordos." {n}Heinrix's eyes are fixed on Emelina, but she does not look at him. Then the Interrogator turns his gaze on you.{/n}
traits.speaker: HeinrixCompanion

traits.speaker: HeinrixCompanion

traits.locale_text: "Emelina Iona Lichtenhart. In the name of the Inquisition, you are hereby removed from your post and expelled from the Holy Ordo." {n}Heinrix's eyes are fixed on Emelina, but she does not look at him. Then the Interrogator turns his gaze on you.{/n}
traits.speaker: HeinrixCompanion

languages.text: “艾米莉娜·艾欧娜·莱肯哈特……以审判庭之名，我在此解除你的职务，将你逐出审判庭。”{n}海因里希目光紧盯着艾米莉娜，但艾米莉娜并没有看他。随后，海因里希将目光转向了你。{/n}
languages.original_text: "Emelina Iona Lichtenhart. In the name of the Inquisition, you are hereby removed from your post and expelled from the Holy Ordo." {n}Heinrix's eyes are fixed on Emelina, but she does not look at him. Then the Interrogator turns his gaze on you.{/n}

traits.locale_text: “艾米莉娜·艾欧娜·莱肯哈特……以审判庭之名，我在此解除你的职务，将你逐出审判庭。”{n}海因里希目光紧盯着艾米莉娜，但艾米莉娜并没有看他。随后，海因里希将目光转向了你。{/n}
traits.speaker: HeinrixCompanion

languages.text: «Emelina Iona Lichtenhart, en nombre de la Inquisición, por la presente queda relegada de su puesto y expulsada de los Santos Ordos». {n}Los ojos de Heinrix no se apartan de Emelina, pero ella no le devuelve la mirada. El interrogador decide girarse hacia ti.{/n}
languages.original_text: "Emelina Iona Lichtenhart. In the name of the Inquisition, you are hereby removed from your post and expelled from the Holy Ordo." {n}Heinrix's eyes are fixed on Emelina, but she does not look at him. Then the Interrogator turns his gaze on you.{/n}

traits.locale_text: «Emelina Iona Lichtenhart, en nombre de la Inquisición, por la presente queda relegada de su puesto y expulsada de los Santos Ordos». {n}Los ojos de Heinrix no se apartan de Emelina, pero ella no le devuelve la mirada. El interrogador decide girarse hacia ti.{/n}
traits.speaker: HeinrixCompanion

languages.text: 「エメリナ・イオナ・リヒテンハルト。異端審問庁の名において、あなたはここにその職務から免職され、聖なる宗団から追放される」{n}ハインリックスの目はエメリナに注がれているが、彼女は彼を見ない。そして、インテロゲイターがあなたへと視線を向けた。{/n}
languages.original_text: "Emelina Iona Lichtenhart. In the name of the Inquisition, you are hereby removed from your post and expelled from the Holy Ordo." {n}Heinrix's eyes are fixed on Emelina, but she does not look at him. Then the Interrogator turns his gaze on you.{/n}

traits.locale_text: 「エメリナ・イオナ・リヒテンハルト。異端審問庁の名において、あなたはここにその職務から免職され、聖なる宗団から追放される」{n}ハインリックスの目はエメリナに注がれているが、彼女は彼を見ない。そして、インテロゲイターがあなたへと視線を向けた。{/n}
traits.speaker: HeinrixCompanion

languages.text: « Emelina Iona Lichtenhart. Au nom de l'Inquisition, je vous relève de vos fonctions et vous exclus du Saint Ordo. » {n}Les yeux d'Heinrix sont fixés sur Emelina, mais celle-ci ne lui rend pas son regard. L'interrogateur se tourne alors vers vous.{/n}
languages.original_text: "Emelina Iona Lichtenhart. In the name of the Inquisition, you are hereby removed from your post and expelled from the Holy Ordo." {n}Heinrix's eyes are fixed on Emelina, but she does not look at him. Then the Interrogator turns his gaze on you.{/n}

traits.locale_text: « Emelina Iona Lichtenhart. Au nom de l'Inquisition, je vous relève de vos fonctions et vous exclus du Saint Ordo. » {n}Les yeux d'Heinrix sont fixés sur Emelina, mais celle-ci ne lui rend pas son regard. L'interrogateur se tourne alors vers vous.{/n}
traits.speaker: HeinrixCompanion

languages.text: "Emelina Iona Lichtenhart. Ihr werdet hiermit im Namen der Inquisition Eures Postens enthoben und aus der Heiligen Ordos verstoßen." {n}Heinrix' Blick fixiert Emelina, aber sie sieht ihn nicht. Dann wendet der Interrogator sich dir zu.{/n}
languages.original_text: "Emelina Iona Lichtenhart. In the name of the Inquisition, you are hereby removed from your post and expelled from the Holy Ordo." {n}Heinrix's eyes are fixed on Emelina, but she does not look at him. Then the Interrogator turns his gaze on you.{/n}

traits.locale_text: "Emelina Iona Lichtenhart. Ihr werdet hiermit im Namen der Inquisition Eures Postens enthoben und aus der Heiligen Ordos verstoßen." {n}Heinrix' Blick fixiert Emelina, aber sie sieht ihn nicht. Dann wendet der Interrogator sich dir zu.{/n}
traits.speaker: HeinrixCompanion

languages.text: "Emelina İona Lichtenhart. Engizisyon adına an itibarıyla vazifenden alınmış ve Kutsal Nizam'dan uzaklaştırılmış bulunuyorsun." {n}Heinrix'in gözleri Emelina'ya kilitli, Emelina'ysa ona bakmıyor. Ardından Sorgucu, bakışlarını sana çeviriyor.{/n}
languages.original_text: "Emelina Iona Lichtenhart. In the name of the Inquisition, you are hereby removed from your post and expelled from the Holy Ordo." {n}Heinrix's eyes are fixed on Emelina, but she does not look at him. Then the Interrogator turns his gaze on you.{/n}

traits.locale_text: "Emelina İona Lichtenhart. Engizisyon adına an itibarıyla mevkinden alınmış ve Kutsal Nizam'dan uzaklaştırılmış bulunuyorsun." {n}Heinrix'in gözleri Emelina'ya odaklı ancak Emelina ona bakmıyor. Ardından Sorgucu bakışlarını sana çeviriyor.{/n}
traits.speaker: HeinrixCompanion
